value.title: Fixing Time Calculations in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows why you may hit some issues with time calculations and how to fix time. He typically sees this when using a Data Warehouse.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Power BI URL Filter Updates (August 2018)

The update to using URL Filter parameters in Power BI include updates to operators along with the ability to use more than strings and spaces in table names! value.title: Row-Level Security in Power BI - Revisited
